name: 2048 Mahjong - Get 9 and 1-9!
description:
The goal of the game is to merge numbers to get 9 and then 123456789!

You have only 3x4=12 cells, so it is quite challenging.

You can play the game using either numbers or Mahjong tiles.

The operation is simple. Just swipe the screen! Same numbers or Mahjong tiles on the swiping direction will be merged automatically.

Wish you enjoy it.
